Ukraine tells White House of plan to fire top commander -sourcesThe Ukrainian government has informed the White House that it plans to fire the country's top military commander overseeing the war against Russian occupation forces, two knowledgeable sources said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:24:37 GMT RP7VCU7NHVMZNLKAA567XAPOGU https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-tells-white-house-plan-fire-top-commander-sources-2024-02-02/Max Hunder, Steve Holland世界
What is Kataib Hezbollah, the group blamed for killing US troops?United States on Friday launched retaliatory strikes following an attack by Iran-backed Iraqi militants earlier this week that left three U.S. soldiers in Jordan dead and injured 40 more. The Pentagon has said the attack has the "footprints" of Iran-backed Iraqi militia Kataib Hezbollah. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:03:51 GMT LAME4Y7SGNN6TCVJCEKKP46CVE https://www.reuters.com/world/what-is-kataib-hezbollah-group-blamed-killing-us-troops-2024-02-02/Reuters世界
Senegalese Democratic Party pushes to postpone presidential electionThe Senegalese Democratic Party (PDS) on Friday said it requested the postponement of the Feb. 25 presidential election via a bill submitted to parliament, citing incidents it alleged had compromised the transparency and integrity of the vote. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 22:35:41 GMT Q3M2ZPJW2NPSVLSTENHO7WEHI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/senegalese-democratic-party-requests-postponement-presidential-election-2024-02-02/Diadie Ba, Bate Felix世界非洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy hails arrival of new air defence systemsUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy welcomed the arrival on Friday of two new air defence systems that he said could "shoot down anything". Fri, 02 Feb 2024 22:05:52 GMT 7NSIV2UNKBJPVDCR3UBP3LBTUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-hails-arrival-new-air-defence-systems-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea tested firing cruise missiles on Feb 2 -KCNANorth Korea tested its cruise missiles as well as new land-to-air missiles off its west coast on Feb. 2, state media reported on Saturday, confirming a barrage of launches for weapons it said are aimed at enhancing defense capabilities. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:59:14 GMT BSVB3QK4BJITZD42K663SBKIHI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-tested-firing-cruise-missiles-feb-2-kcna-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Argentina lawmakers push Milei's 'omnibus' reform bill over key hurdleArgentina's lower chamber of deputies gave overall approval to libertarian President Javier Milei's sweeping "omnibus" reform bill in a vote on Friday after days of debate, paving the way for a decisive vote in the Senate. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:57:24 GMT R3PH4VRW3RP6DKNHTYP4632RYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentina-lower-chamber-approves-mileis-omnibus-reform-b​​ill-2024-02-02/Nicolás Misculin世界美洲
Italy to supply admiral for EU Red Sea naval missionItaly will provide the admiral in command of a European Union Red Sea naval mission to protect ships from attacks by Yemen's Houthi militia, Defence Minister Guido Crosetto said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:53:15 GMT I3KFLTZ5XJKIFBM6JXJZWBXYIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-supply-admiral-eu-red-sea-naval-mission-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
US starts strikes in Iraq and Syria against Iran-linked targetsThe U.S. military launched airstrikes on Friday in Iraq and Syria against more than 85 targets linked to Iran's Revolutionary Guard (IRGC) and the militias it backs, following last weekend's attack in Jordan that killed three U.S. troops. White House national security spokesman John Kirby said the Iraqi government was notified about the strikes ahead of time. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:17:32 GMT 2J6EYAJ2CRKHJFJV4AGZ22INUE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-starts-retaliatory-strikes-iraq-syria-officials-2024-02-02/Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界
Islamist rebels kill at least nine in eastern Congo attacks - armyIslamist rebels killed at least nine civilians in a string of attacks on Thursday and Friday in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, the army and local authorities said. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 20:55:08 GMT QRGQG2PPRBIKJEQPQWFB7AFJ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/islamist-rebels-kill-least-9-eastern-congo-attacks-army-2024-02-02/Yassin Kombi世界非洲
Brazil's military reinforces border with Venezuela and Guyana due to EsequiboA convoy of military trucks and armored vehicles set off for Brazil's northern border on Friday to reinforce the presence of the Brazilian army in response to tensions over Venezuela's claim to Guyana's Esequibo region. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 20:06:54 GMT ZH3S5QHEUZITRIZ63UA3E2C6JE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-military-reinforces-border-with-venezuela-guyana-due-esequibo-2024-02-02/Bruno Kelly世界美洲
Houthis say they fired ballistic missiles at Israel's EilatYemen's Iran-allied Houthi movement said on Friday it fired ballistic missiles at targets in the Israeli city of Eilat and threatened to keep up military operations until Israel ended its offensive in Gaza.
